creator: remie@backbase.com
text:
In addition to build.xml, build.ant should also be recognized as a default input file for ant if the -f switch is not used.

I will create a path for this proposal in a short while, however input is desired if this is a good suggestion yes or no.

Cheers,

Remie
"I will create a path for this proposal..." should have been "I will create a patch for this proposal..."
creator: remie@backbase.com

text:

Proposal for implementing bug 46034

It compiles locally, however, I do not have the means to really test it. I would be grateful if someone can review and test the code.
